```{r, indent = "    ", message = FALSE, fig.width = 3}
x1 <- c(-1, -0.8, -0.3, 0.3, 0.8, 1)
decagon_top <- sqrt(1 - (x1)^2)
x2 <- c(1, 0.8, 0.3, -0.3, -0.8, -1)
decagon_bot <- -1*sqrt(1 - (x2)^2)
decagon <- data.frame(x = c(x1, x2), y = c(decagon_bot, decagon_top))
ggplot(decagon, aes(x, y)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_path() +
  theme_minimal()

```

  geom_density() +
  stat_function(fun = dnorm, args = list(mean = 3, sd = 2), color = "red") +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 8, color = "red", linetype = "twodash", size = 1) +
  theme_minimal()

## Question 2

a. 
```{r spectral decomposition (eigendecompostion), indent = "    ", message = FALSE}
A <- matrix(c(
  -1, 3, 1,
  -7, 9, 1,
  -2, 3, 4),
  nrow = 3, byrow = TRUE)
I <- matrix(c(
  1, 0, 0,
  0, 1, 0,
  0, 0, 1),
  nrow = 3, byrow = TRUE)

r <- eigen(A)
V <- r$vector
lam <- r$values
Lambda <- lam*I

V %*% Lambda %*% solve(V)
```


b.
```{r spectral decomposition of real symmetric matrices, indent = "    "}
A <- matrix(c(
  10, 2, -6,
  2, 7, 0,
  -6, 0, 2),
  nrow = 3, byrow = TRUE)
I <- matrix(c(
  1, 0, 0,
  0, 1, 0,
  0, 0, 1),
  nrow = 3, byrow = TRUE)

r <- eigen(A)
V <- r$vector
lam <- r$values
Lambda <- lam*I

zapsmall(V %*% t(V))

zapsmall(V %*% Lambda %*% t(V))

```
